segments.text: When do we get off the bus ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think we have a while longer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I feel like we've been on this bus forever .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you sure we weren't supposed to get off already ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I thought you knew where we get off at .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wasn't really paying attention . I think we missed our stop .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , we definitely missed our stop .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's the last time I get on a bus with you .
segments.speaker: S1
